text: I apologize for the problem with Q7. It would be nice if Blackboard would warn us that choosing random display would mean that we couldn’t reference options by letter when offering combination choices. Anyway, the question will have to be thrown out. I’m sorry if you got 6/6 but I understand that many of you may have received 6 for the wrong answer. The correct answer, BTW, was _priority_ _queue_ _or_ _linear_ _scan_.
I will summarize the answers on Blackboard by this evening.

It has come to my attention that submissions for Assignment 4 are not following the standard requirements specified (see Assignment 1). I’m not sure how the T/As want to handle this but, if you haven’t already submitted, please pay attention to the requirements otherwise you may get deductions.
